verses.verse: An oracle <S%H4853><s%> about Nineveh. <S%H5210><s%> The book <S%H5612><s%> of the vision <S%H2377><s%> of Nahum <S%H5151><s%> the Elkoshite. <S%H512><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> is a jealous <S%H7072><s%> God <S%H410><s%> and avenges. <S%H5358><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> avenges <S%H5358><s%> and is full of wrath. <S%H1167><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> takes vengeance <S%H5358><s%> on his adversaries, <S%H6862><s%> and he maintains <S%H5201><s%> wrath against his enemies. <S%H341><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> is slow <S%H750><s%> to anger, <S%H639><s%> and great <S%H1419><s%> in power, <S%H3581><s%> and will by no means <S%H5352><s%> leave the guilty unpunished. <S%H5352><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has his way <S%H1870><s%> in the whirlwind <S%H5492><s%> and in the storm, <S%H8183><s%> and the clouds <S%H6051><s%> are the dust <S%H80><s%> of his feet. <S%H7272><s%>

He rebukes <S%H1605><s%> the sea, <S%H3220><s%> and makes it dry, <S%H2717><s%> and dries up <S%H3001><s%> all the rivers. <S%H5104><s%> Bashan <S%H1316><s%> languishes, <S%H535><s%> and Carmel; <S%H3760><s%> and the flower <S%H6525><s%> of Lebanon <S%H3844><s%> languishes. <S%H535><s%>

The mountains <S%H2022><s%> quake <S%H7493><s%> before him, <S%H1389><s%> and the hills melt <S%H4127><s%> away. <S%H776><s%> The earth trembles <S%H5375><s%> at his presence, <S%H6440><s%> yes, <S%H8398><s%> the world, and all who dwell in it. <S%H3427><s%>

Who can stand <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> his indignation? <S%H2195><s%> Who can endure <S%H6965><s%> the fierceness <S%H2740><s%> of his anger? <S%H639><s%> His wrath <S%H2534><s%> is poured out <S%H5413><s%> like fire, <S%H784><s%> and the rocks <S%H6697><s%> are broken apart by him. <S%H5422><s%>
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> is good, <S%H2896><s%> a stronghold <S%H4581><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> of trouble; <S%H6869><s%> and he knows <S%H3045><s%> those who take refuge in him. <S%H2620><s%>

But with an overflowing <S%H5674><s%> flood, <S%H7858><s%> he will make <S%H6213><s%> a full end <S%H3617><s%> of her place, <S%H4725><s%> and will pursue <S%H7291><s%> his enemies <S%H341><s%> into darkness. <S%H2822><s%>
What do you plot <S%H2803><s%> against Yahweh? <S%H3068><s%> He will make <S%H6213><s%> a full end. <S%H3617><s%> Affliction <S%H6869><s%> won't <S%H6965><s%> rise up the second time. <S%H6471><s%>

For entangled <S%H5440><s%> like thorns, <S%H5518><s%> and drunken <S%H5433><s%> as with their drink, <S%H5435><s%> they are consumed <S%H398><s%> utterly <S%H4392><s%> like dry <S%H3002><s%> stubble. <S%H7179><s%>
There is one gone forth out <S%H3318><s%> of you, <S%H2803><s%> who devises evil <S%H7451><s%> against Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> who counsels <S%H3289><s%> wickedness. <S%H1100><s%>

Thus says <S%H559><s%> Yahweh: <S%H3068><s%> "Though they be in full strength, <S%H8003><s%> and likewise many, <S%H7227><s%> even so they will be cut down, <S%H1494><s%> and he shall pass away. <S%H5674><s%> Though I have afflicted <S%H6031><s%> you, <S%H6031><s%> I will afflict you no more.
Now will I break <S%H7665><s%> his yoke <S%H4132><s%> from off you, <S%H5423><s%> and will burst your bonds <S%H4147><s%> apart. <S%H5423><s%>"

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has commanded <S%H6680><s%> concerning you: <S%H2232><s%> "No more descendants will bear your name. <S%H8034><s%> Out of the house <S%H1004><s%> of your gods, <S%H430><s%> will I cut off <S%H3772><s%> the engraved image <S%H6459><s%> and the molten image. <S%H4541><s%> I will make <S%H7760><s%> your grave, <S%H6913><s%> for you are vile. <S%H7043><s%>"

Behold, <S%H2022><s%> on the mountains the feet <S%H7272><s%> of him who brings good news, <S%H1319><s%> who publishes <S%H8085><s%> peace! <S%H7965><s%> Keep <S%H2287><s%> your feasts, <S%H2282><s%> Judah! <S%H3063><s%> Perform <S%H7999><s%> your vows, <S%H5088><s%> for the wicked <S%H1100><s%> one will no more <S%H3254><s%> pass through <S%H5674><s%> you. <S%H3772><s%> He is utterly cut off.
